sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SWINDLER, a word which has been lately adopted into the Engliſh language, derived from the German word sch windel, " to cheat.” Swindling has now become ſo common in ſeveral of the great towns of this country, that it is unfortunately too well known to require any deſcription.
